resources.string: Hello, and welcome to an app I like to call \'SimpleMockup\' !

Underneath this, you will find a little app I built that features (what I think) is some useful stuff! A MenuDrawer with added layout tricks, and a ViewPager with a fixed/static ImageView at the top, and (if you have KitKat) a translucent app decor.
I will try and keep this updated as much as possible for you guys, adding in any code you guys request. :)
